product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner is designed with a soft and elegant theme, ideal for showcasing premium jewelry. It is divided into four quadrants with alternating shades of pastel pink and rose tones, enriched with fine linear and curved decorative elements. The top-left quadrant contains bold and modern heading text layers "heading_1" and "heading_2", followed by a smaller, uppercase subheading "subheading" below it. The top-right quadrant features a centered high-quality image of earrings marked by "product_image". The bottom-left quadrant includes a bullet-point details list ("description") describing the product, followed by the stylish price element ("price"). The bottom section concludes with a rounded-rectangle call-to-action button made of "cta_background" with the text "cta" centered within.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Light Blush Pink (#FFF5F6)  
- Rosy Beige (#FDE8EB)  
- Pale Rose (#F9D0D6)  
- Rose Gold (#C17A82)  
- Deep Mauve (#7D494F)  
- Dusty Rose (#AF6971)  
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant earrings designed with a delicate color palette of rose gold and brilliant white. The core color is a soft rose pink (#F4A8A3) forming the metallic base, giving the earrings warmth and femininity. This is beautifully accented by the bright diamond-like stones in clear white (#FFFFFF) and subtle silver reflections (#DADADA) that enhance luminosity. The colors are seamlessly blended, highlighting the contrast between the matte and glossy surfaces. A soft peach-pink gradient (#FAD6D9) subtly transitions around the petal design, emphasizing elegance. This palette evokes luxury, making it ideal for a sophisticated advertisement banner.
